mapper.select: select t.*,b.name as bname,u.name as uname from t_books_discuss t,t_books b,t_user u where t.id = #{id} and t.books_id=b.id and t.user_id=u.id

select t.*,b.name as bname,u.name as uname from t_books_discuss t,t_books b,t_user u where t.books_id=b.id and t.user_id=u.id and t.books_id=#{id} order by t.publish_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
select count(t.id) from t_books_discuss t,t_books b,t_user u where t.books_id=b.id and t.user_id=u.id and t.books_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_books_discuss (user_id, books_id, publish_time,content) values (#{userId}, #{booksId},#{publishTime},#{content})
mapper.update: update t_books_discuss set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
